text: Diesel generators in the Motores de Pacifico building Ground-level entrance to the Estación de Chamberí Platform 0 () is an exhibition project of the Madrid Metro consisting of the historical Estación de Chamberí, which has been out of service since 1966, and the Motores de Pacífico generator building. Visitors can view the restored 1919 station with its original ceramic billboards and antique furniture, as well as displays about the history of the Madrid Metro. == References == Category:Madrid Metro Category:Museums in Madrid Category:Transport museums in Spain
title: Platform 0 (Madrid Metro)
